required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effectiveness of Using Interactive Consulting System to Enhance Decision Aids of COVID-19 Vaccination
clinical_study.official_title: Effectiveness of Using Interactive Consulting System to Enhance Decision Aids of COVID-19 Vaccination

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the performance of an interactive chatbot and assess its effectiveness for enhancing informed decisions made by cataract patients.

primary_outcome.measure: Informed choice about COVID-19 vaccination (the proportion of participants who make an informed choiceï¼Œwhich is defined as a good knowledge score and an intention that is consistent with their attitude score)
primary_outcome.description: Informed choice is an aggregated measure of multiple measurements, including knowledge (a 10-item questionnaire that assesses knowledge), attitudes (6 items, with 5 responses for each), and intentions (single item with 5 responses)

arm_group.description: A chatbot of patient decision aid embedded into a mobile application which is able to bidirectionally interact with patients and provide standard general information, quantitative risk information on the possible outcomes of COVID-19 vaccination.

intervention.description: An interactive chatbot for patient decision aid A chatbot of patient decision aid embedded into a mobile application which is able to bidirectionally interact with patients and provide standard general information, quantitative risk information on the possible outcomes of COVID-19 vaccination.
